Definition 2 (Subharmonic and Superharmonic Functions):
Let $u$ be a $C^2$ function in $U$. Then $u$ is a subharmonic (superharmonic) function in $U$ if $\Delta u \geq 0$ ($\Delta u \leq 0$).
